title: Northern Tamil Nadu Jain Tirths
author: Chirag Jain
description: A pilgrimage through the ancient Jain heritage sites of Northern Tamil Nadu, including mountain temples and rock-cut shrines.

stops.name: Shree Kshetra Arihantagiri
stops.description: Major pilgrimage center located 230 km from Bangalore.

stops.name: Arihanthgiri Ancient Mountain Temples
stops.description: Features 3-4 temples, Samadhi Sthal of Acharya Shri Samantabhadra, and Pandava Caves.

stops.name: Arani Saidapet Jain Temple
stops.description: Located 19 km from the mountain temples.

stops.name: Shri 1008 Bhagwan Adinath Digambar Jain Temple, Arani
stops.description: A significant Digambar Jain temple in Arani.

stops.name: Poondi Ponezhil Nathar Digamber Jain (Arugar) Temple
stops.description: Ancient Jain temple located in Poondi.

stops.name: Ancient Jain Temple Munigiri, Karandai
stops.description: Historical temple site located 45 km from Poondi.

stops.name: Thiruppanamoor Digambar Jain Temple
stops.description: A local Digambar temple site.

stops.name: Thiruparuthikundram Sri Digambar Jain Temples, Kanchivaram
stops.description: Important Jain heritage site in Kanchivaram.

stops.name: Ponnur Malai Dharmshala
stops.description: Night stay featuring 2 temples.

stops.name: Acharya Kund Kund Charan, Ponnur Hill
stops.description: The sacred footprints of Acharya Kund Kund.

stops.name: Sri Adinath Digamber Jain Temple
stops.description: Includes 3-4 other temples at the site.

stops.name: Thirakoil Jain Hill
stops.description: Contains cave temples on the hill and at the base.

stops.name: Ariyampoondi Rock Cut Mahavir Jain Temple
stops.description: An ancient rock-cut temple dedicated to Bhagwan Mahavir.

stops.name: Sri 1008 Adinath Digambar Jain Temple, Ponnur
stops.description: Local Adinath temple in the Ponnur area.

stops.name: Ancient Bhagwan Adinath Temple, Salukkai
stops.description: A 2300-year-old ancient temple site.

stops.name: 1008 Bhagavan Sri Adinath Digambar Jain Basadi, Vizhukkam
stops.description: Digambar Jain temple located 40 km from Salukkai.

stops.name: Mel Chitamur (Jin Kanchi)
stops.description: The administrative center (Jin Kanchi) of the Tamil Jain community.

stops.name: Thirunathan Kundru Jain Hill
stops.description: An ancient Jain hill site near Mel Chitamur.

title: Mysuru, Sravanabelgola & Gommatgiri Tour
author: Chirag Jain
description: A classic journey to the world-famous Gommateshwara statue and historic sites of Southern Karnataka.

stops.name: Srirangapatna Jain Temple
stops.description: An ancient temple located near historic Srirangapatna.

stops.name: Mysuru Jain Temple
stops.description: Visit the local temple and explore Mysuru palace.

stops.name: Gommatgiri
stops.description: Small hillock with an ancient statue of Bahubali.

stops.name: Kaaveri Dhaam
stops.description: A peaceful temple and viewpoint on the banks of the river Kaveri.

stops.name: Assam Bhavan, Sravanabelgola
stops.description: Comfortable stay with AC rooms available. Can also go for 'Vidyanand Nilaya' for a cheaper stay or in case if this dharmshala is full.

stops.name: Chandragiri Hill
stops.description: Site of 15 ancient temples and the Samadhi cave of Acharya Bhadrabahu.

stops.name: Vindhyagiri Hill
stops.description: Home to the massive monolithic idol of Bahubali Swamy.

stops.name: Jain Mutt Temple
stops.description: Darshan, followed by lunch at the nearby Bhojanshala.

stops.name: Jinnathpuram
stops.description: An ancient Jain pilgrimage site near Sravanabelgola.

stops.name: Kambadahalli Jain Mutt
stops.description: A 2000-year-old temple complex and gurukul.

stops.name: Shri Paras Dham Atishay Kshetra
stops.description: A significant miraculous site (Atishay Kshetra) nearby.

stops.name: Mandargiri Hill
stops.description: Features a unique Samosharan temple and a scenic lake viewpoint.

title: West Karnataka Coastal Pilgrimage
author: Chirag Jain
description: A journey through the coastal Jain belt featuring several Bahubali monoliths.

stops.name: Shri Digambar Jain Temple, Mangaluru
stops.description: Ancient temple located near Mangalore Central station.

stops.name: Saavira Kambada Basadi, Moodbadri
stops.description: Famous '1000-pillar temple' with lunch facilities.

stops.name: Vennoor Bahubali
stops.description: A historic monolithic statue of Bahubali.

stops.name: Adinath Swamy Basadi, Vennoor
stops.description: Located within 1 km of the Vennoor Bahubali statue.

stops.name: Dharmasthala Bahubali
stops.description: Modern monolith with a dedicated Jain dining hall.

stops.name: Ratnatraya Basadi Atishay Kshetra
stops.description: A sacred site offering night stay facilities.

stops.name: Karkala Bahubali
stops.description: Ancient monolithic statue on a rocky hill.

stops.name: Chaturmukh Basadi, Karkala
stops.description: Unique four-faced architectural marvel.

stops.name: Varanga Lake Jain Temple
stops.description: A beautiful temple situated in the middle of a lake.

stops.name: Kundadri Shri Parshwanath Basadi
stops.description: Tapasthali of Acharya Shri Kund Kund.

stops.name: Jwalamalini Atishay Kshetra, N R Pura
stops.description: Prominent temple dedicated to Yakshini Jwalamalini.

stops.name: Humcha Jain Temple
stops.description: Major pilgrimage center for Padmavati Devi.

title: Bundelkhand Digambar Jain Yatra
author: Chirag Jain
description: A deep exploration of Jainism in Madhya Pradesh, including the magnificent Kundalpur.

stops.name: Ramtek Jain Temples
stops.description: Complete morning rituals at the hill temples.

stops.name: Seoni Bada Mandir
stops.description: Historical temple in Seoni.

stops.name: Pisanhari ki Madhiya Ji, Jabalpur
stops.description: Scenic temple with full stay and food facilities.

stops.name: Shasanoday Tirth, Hanumantal
stops.description: Site for darshan near Jabalpur.

stops.name: Beena Baarah Atishay Kshetra
stops.description: Significant pilgrimage site with dining hall.

stops.name: Shri Bade Baba, Kundalpur
stops.description: The massive idol of Adinath Bhagwan (Bade Baba).

stops.name: Kundalpur Parvat Vandana
stops.description: Veneration of the various temples on the Kundalpur hills.

stops.name: Bahoriband Atishay Kshetra
stops.description: Ancient site with a large Shantinath idol.

title: Mandargiri & Sravanabelgola Circuit
author: Chirag Jain
description: A relaxed 2-day trip highlighting Mandargiri architecture and Sravanabelgola.

stops.name: Mandargiri Hill
stops.description: Features a large samosharan and scenic lake viewpoint.

stops.name: Assam Bhavan, Sravanabelgola
stops.description: Comfortable stay with AC rooms available. Can also go for 'Vidyanand Nilaya' for a cheaper stay or in case if this dharmshala is full.

stops.name: Chandragiri Hill
stops.description: Site of 15 ancient temples and the Samadhi cave of Acharya Bhadrabahu.

stops.name: Vindhyagiri Hill
stops.description: Home to the massive monolithic idol of Bahubali Swamy.

stops.name: Jain Mutt Temple
stops.description: Darshan, followed by lunch at the nearby Bhojanshala.

stops.name: Jinnathpuram
stops.description: An ancient Jain pilgrimage site near Sravanabelgola.

stops.name: Kambadahalli Jain Mutt
stops.description: A 2000-year-old temple complex and gurukul.

stops.name: Shri Paras Dham Atishay Kshetra
stops.description: A significant miraculous site (Atishay Kshetra) nearby.

title: Hyderabad & Kulcharam Pilgrimage
author: Chirag Jain
description: An exploration of ancient and historic Jain temples in the Hyderabad region.

stops.name: Aghapura Jain Temple
stops.description: Houses a 4th-era idol of Shri Chandraprabhu Bhagwan.

stops.name: Shri Kalikund Parshwanath, Hathnoora
stops.description: An 800-year-old temple; idol found in a local pond.

stops.name: Shri Vighnahar Parshwanath, Kulcharam
stops.description: Significant Atishay Kshetra and site of historical Chaturmas.

title: Bangalore to Hyderabad Heritage Trail
author: Chirag Jain
description: A cross-state journey following the path of the legendary Acharya Kunda Kunda.

stops.name: Penukonda Jain Temples
stops.description: A complex featuring three significant Jain temples.

stops.name: Konda Kunda
stops.description: The sacred birthplace of Acharya Kunda Kunda.

stops.name: Hyderabad Jain Gurukul Temple
stops.description: Educational and spiritual center in Hyderabad.

stops.name: Kulcharam Parshwanath
stops.description: Significant Atishay Kshetra near Hyderabad.

stops.name: Ramoji Film City
stops.description: Leisure visit to the film studio complex.
